body.name: ECHOGEAR Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket for TVs Up to 82" - Smooth Extension, Swivel, & Tilt - Wall Template for Easy Install - Centers & Levels After Mounting Plus Hides Your Cables
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 42 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 27 mins
features: Get your TV on the wall and ready for movie night. This smooth full motion mount works with screens up to 82" and is certified for safety.

Installs in less than 20 minutes. Nope, that’s not an exaggeration. We even threw in a paper wall template for worry-free drilling. You can even level, center on the wall, and hide cables after install.
Works with what you've got. Expanded hardware pack ensures compatibility with Samsung, Sony, Vizio, and more.
Extends 19" from the wall so you can swivel the screen to watch from anywhere in the room. Perfect the view with the upgraded tilt mechanism.
Hit a snag with install? Our Minnesota-based product nerds are available 7 days a week to help out.
ECHOGEAR cares. We're planting a tree for every EGLF3 TV mount sold. So far we've planted over 500,000 trees!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Polished look, very well made!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mount for our new Samsung Q70R 65" TV as this is exactly what I was wanting.The mount is very well designed and has a finished look, smooth rounded edges just makes it clean looking when installed. The other mounts that have the rectangular mounting plates are unappealing especially when it's hanging in the living room and very noticeable.This mount is made for either mason or stud wall installation on 16" centers with a little room to maneuver. Once installed, the full motion arm assembly can be adjusted to the left or right to center on the wall and is very easy to adjust. Installation could not have been easier especially when using the provided install template (less than 20 minutes)! The only snag I ran into was the spacers for the mounting brackets on the TV. The included hardware was great but the bolts were a little too long and the large spacers were to big so I used the spacers that came with the TV and the small spacers that came with the mount. In order to shim it out enough to where the bolts did not bottom out on the panel I added 1 2mm nylon space for each bolt and it was the perfect spacing. The actual mount is an elongated "H" that allowed me to install a 2 gang power bridge in the open area of the mount without it interfering with the arm when placed flush to the wall. The kit I used was the Arlington TVBR2505K Flat Panel TV Cable Organizer 2-Gang Kit with Recessed Power Solution purchased on Amazon as well.All said and done this is a great mount, well designed and handles the weight of the TV as it should without and sagging and the movement is very smooth and easy to adjust. I'm glad I found these guys, overall 100% satisfied!The pictures show the mount and TV with the power bridge...don't be at ke down on the cabling as I am not done yet, I am waiting on a delivery from Amazon today that has 4-4' Echogear 2.1 HDMI cables and 1-15' Echogear 2.1 HDMI cable to finish out the installation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this product is first-rate, including the packaging. Instructions are excellent. It pays to throughly read the instructions before even unboxing the wall mount. The mount itself exceeds my expectations. For a device that will be out of sight most of the time, it's a work of art. Follow the step by step and you can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid mount that’s easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mount that comes with all the hardware required. The instructions are easy to follow and quite humorous! Very easy to lift the TV onto the mount and move around almost weightlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for our patio!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, maneuver and very sturdy! Allows us to watch tv from the porch, pool and hot tub! We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for wall studs that are off center!
reviews.reviewText: The wall studs were not centered where I wanted to put my TV, so I searched for a wall mount that could center the TV. I called ECHOGEAR and they suggested the EGFL3. It worked great! TV is right were I want it and installation was super easy if you have basic knowledge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid and smooth with a couple quirks
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid mount that holds our 65 inch TV very well. The mounting bracket for the wall has some nice covers to hide the screw heads, and the process to place the TV on the mount makes it fairly easy to do, although you still will need a helper. The mount has a bunch of moving pieces that make it a little crowded for cables when you push it back close to the wall, so take that into consideration when running your cables. The included cable clips are useless, so find some velcro cable straps or similar. It comes with a bunch of screw sizes for the TV, but not the best length for what I needed, so I picked those up at the hardware store. The only real issue with installation was that the locking straps to hold the TV upright brackets to the mount required some bending to fit properly around the horizontal pieces of the mount. It looks like they aren't bent exactly right from the factory. My only other wish is that the leveling adjustment could have some kind of fine adjustment screw as it's hard to get exactly right the first time. Otherwise, the TV comes out easily from the wall to work with connections, and it swivels well if you want to view from another sitting area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: How it works. Quality structure. I like echo gear overall. Instructions are very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mount, it’s sturdy, it moves every which way. It’s mounted outside on my lanai in a stucco block wall, I used tapcon screws instead of the screws that came with the mount, just because I’ve had good luck with tapcon concrete screws in the past and they make smaller holes. I have a 55 inch tv on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is well thought through allowing you to adjust the positioning of the TV. The box and instructions were detailed, helpful and funny.
Dommage que la notice soit uniquement en anglais

Really great look and fantastic quality. The packaging is extremely premium, it almost felt like opening a giant smartphone. The box has awesome drawings inside and the instructions are full of jokes and casual English. Refreshing change from the boring broken English that usually accompanies these kinds of products. Seems like this company really cares about the quality and user experience. The mount is easily adjustable and can be manipulated to perfectly fit whatever surface you put it on.

Really well made TV mount. My only criticism is that it is quite stiff when articulating in and out, which can be an issue when moving my LG C9 as there isn't really anywhere for me to push/pull on. Would be nice to be able to adjust the friction, as can be done on the tilt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I think the rules of engagement are quite simple; MAKE SURE you peruse the instructions carefully, and I mean carefully. Follow those instructions and the end result will leave you speechless. Do I really need to say anything more?? Perhaps, that I installed a 75” TV on this bracket and experienced zero issues. It’s by far the best alternative to expensive OEM options. 10/10
